articles.title: 2025 NBA playoff odds, picks: Pacers vs. Bucks predictions from betting expert on 143-83 roll - CBS Sports
articles.description: SportsLine expert Matt Severance, who has returned $4,452 on all NBA picks, reveals his NBA playoff predictions for Game 1 of the Milwaukee Bucks vs. Indiana Pacers
articles.content: The 2025 NBA playoffs tip off on Saturday, with a rematch of last year's first round featured in the opening game of the day. The 4-seed Indiana Pacers (50-32) will host the 5-seed Milwaukee Bucks (4… [+4809 chars]
